text: He imanadaragana! Pandita ebam sansara-biragidera madhye aneke'i to janasadharanera dhana-sampada an'yayabhabe khaya ebam manusake allahâ€Œra patha theke nibrtta kare [1]. Ara yara sbarna o raupya punjibhuta kare ebam ta allahâ€Œra pathe byaya kare na [2] apani taderake yantranadayaka sastira susambada dina
